wu-etal-2023-cross.title: Cross-Cultural Analysis of Human Values, Morals, and Biases in Folk Tales
wu-etal-2023-cross.author:
Wu, Winston  and
Wang, Lu  and
Mihalcea, Rada
wu-etal-2023-cross.paperMotivationText: Investigation of how literature influences and reflects cultural norms
wu-etal-2023-cross.paperContributionText: A corpus with >1,900 folk tales from 27 cultures and an analysis of  how human values, morals, and gender biases in the corpus
wu-etal-2023-cross.paperResultsText: Results show differences between cultures in prevalent values and morals and cross-cultural trends in gender biases.
wu-etal-2023-cross.dataYesCommentText: not clear which tales have been included in the analysis (URL in the paper doesn't exist)
